api/BOOSEapplication.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | BooseInterpreter
api/BOOSEapplication.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace BOOSEapplication Assembly BOOSEapplication.dll AppCanvas inherits from Icanvas and manages the drawing surfaces, pen setting and the rendering. public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas(int, int) gets a new canvas with the spefic width and height, also creates the underlying bitmap and prepares the drawing suface then sets the background to white and positions the pen at defaualt position public AppCanvas(int xsize, int ysize) Parameters xsize int width of canvas ysize int height of canvas Properties PenColour Pen colour property public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Current X/Y positions public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos gets ir sets the current Y co-Ords of the pen public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) will draw a circle on the cansvas at the pens current pos, the circle is centred around the Xpos and Ypos and has a specific radius. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int the radius of circle, this will detrmine the size of the circle filled bool if its true will draw the circle filled if not only the outline will be drawn of the circle Clear() public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) draws a line from the pen position at its current state to a specifed x,y co-ords and then the pens postion gets updated to the new location public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int the X co-ord it will draw to y int the Y co-ord it will draw to MoveTo(int, int) moves the pen to a specified x,y co-ord without drawing, then updated the current pen position for the next drawing public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int new X co-ord for the pen positioning y int new Y co-ord for the pen positioning Rect(int, int, bool) draws a rectangle at the pens current position public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int width of the rectangle drawing height int height of the rectangle drawing filled bool if true will draw a filled rectangele if false will only draw outline of the rectangle Reset() resets the pen position to its default co-ords (100,100) public void Reset() Set(int, int) the drawing canvas is initialised with a new bitmap of the specified width and height, this also recreated the graphic surface and clears it to a white background public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int width of new canvas height int height of new canvas SetColour(int, int, int) sets the current pen colour using the specified R,G,B value public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int red pen colour green int green pen colour blue int blue pen colour Tri(int, int) draws a triagle(Only here to satisfy BOOSE public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int width of the triangle height int height of the triangle WriteText(string) writes text onto the canvas at the current penposition, its drawn using the current pen colour and a default font public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string the string to be wrte onto the canvas getBitmap() gets the current bitmap representing the canvas drawing surface and allows it to have external components to access the rendered image public object getBitmap() Returns object the bitmap object which contains the current state of the canvas

api/BOOSEapplication.AppCircle.html.title: Class AppCircle | BooseInterpreter
api/BOOSEapplication.AppCircle.html.summary: Class AppCircle Namespace BOOSEapplication Assembly BOOSEapplication.dll command which draws a circle on the canvas public class AppCircle : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter AppCircle Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Methods CheckParameters(string[]) will validate parameters provided for the circle command public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameters) Parameters parameters string[] A string array which containes one elemant which is the radius of the circle. Exceptions CommandException this is thrown when the number of parameters is not exactly 1 Execute() will execute a circle drawing command only using a validated radius public override void Execute() Exceptions RestrictionException Thrown when the radius is exceeding the maximum allowed size

api/BOOSEapplication.AppCommandFactory.h.title: Class AppCommandFactory | BooseInterpreter
api/BOOSEapplication.AppCommandFactory.h.summary: Class AppCommandFactory Namespace BOOSEapplication Assembly BOOSEapplication.dll Creates command objects based on the command name provided by the user public class AppCommandFactory : CommandFactory, ICommandFactory Inheritance object CommandFactory AppCommandFactory Implements ICommandFactory Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods MakeCommand(string) a class responsible fo creating the instances of BOOSE commands public override ICommand MakeCommand(string name) Parameters name string Returns ICommand Exceptions ICommand CommandException

api/BOOSEapplication.AppDrawTo.html.title: Class AppDrawTo | BooseInterpreter
api/BOOSEapplication.AppDrawTo.html.summary: Class AppDrawTo Namespace BOOSEapplication Assembly BOOSEapplication.dll AppDrawTo inherits from CommandOneParameter.It does a draw commaned where it moves the pen to a new position while drawing a line from the current location public class AppDrawTo : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter AppDrawTo Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Methods CheckParameters(string[]) Interprets the parameters required for the command. Ensures that exactly two values are supplied and assigns them to the X and Y coordinates. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameters) Parameters parameters string[] A string array that must contain the X and Y coordinates to draw to. Exceptions CommandException Thrown when exactly two parameters are not provided. Execute() executes the DrawTo command with pen position specified to the co-ords. public override void Execute()

api/BOOSEapplication.AppMoveTo.html.title: Class AppMoveTo | BooseInterpreter
api/BOOSEapplication.AppMoveTo.html.summary: Class AppMoveTo Namespace BOOSEapplication Assembly BOOSEapplication.dll command which moves the drawing cursor to a new position on the canvas, two parameters requierd(x,y).AppMoveTO inherits from CommandOneParameter. public class AppMoveTo : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter AppMoveTo Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Methods CheckParameters(string[]) public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameters) Parameters parameters string[] String Array whihc contains the X co-ord and the Y co-ord Exceptions CommandException thrown when the exact number of requierd parameters is not there Execute() executes the MoveTo command onto the canvas public override void Execute()

api/BOOSEapplication.AppRect.html.summary: Class AppRect Namespace BOOSEapplication Assembly BOOSEapplication.dll public class AppRect : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter AppRect Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Methods CheckParameters(string[]) checks and validates if the paramaters are correct. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameters) Parameters parameters string[] String array which contains the width and the height of the rectangle Exceptions CommandException this is thrown when one or more of the parameters cannot be parsed as integers. api/BOOSEapplication.PenColour.html.title: Class PenColour | BooseInterpreter
api/BOOSEapplication.PenColour.html.summary: Class PenColour Namespace BOOSEapplication Assembly BOOSEapplication.dll PenColour inhertits from CommandOneParameter.command that sets the pen colour used for drawing in (R,G,B) public class PenColour : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter PenColour Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Methods CheckParameters(string[]) proceses the R,G,B paramaters for the pen colour command and enures that only three values are supplied and changes them to either RED,GREEN or BLUE. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameters) Parameters parameters string[] A string array which cholds : Red, Green and Blue values. Exceptions CommandException thrown when the number of parameters is not 3(because of the R,G,B) Execute() executes the PenColour command public override void Execute() Exceptions RestrictionException Thrown when the blue value is not 0
